location.sjis: ディックル村 住宅地

portrait_l.name: elderly
portrait_l.ascii: Azuki beans are good for the body.

portrait_l.name: child
portrait_l.sjis: ゆうしゃもけんしも なるのはむずかしそうだから かじしになろうかな
portrait_l.ascii: Becoming a hero or a swordsman both seem too hard Maybe I'll be a Craftknight instead.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: アカバネを退治しようって 言ってる奴らがいるらしいが あんな凶暴なヤツと戦うなんて
portrait_l.ascii: I heard there was someone talking about fighting Red Wing. Going up against that

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: あぶなくってしょうがないて
portrait_l.ascii: is way too dangerous for his own good.
